name: PhD Hybrid Lip Glaze Plumping Gloss
about: What it is: A non-sticky, next-gen, four-in-one glaze that fuses a lip oil, balm, plumper, and gloss to hydrate lips and provide burn-free plumping after two weeks of continuous use...Formulation Type: Lip Gloss, Lip Balm and Treatment, and Lip Plumper..Benefits: Hydrating, Plumping..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Polyplumper Complex: Custom blend of Maxi-Lip™ and Volulip™ for visibly fuller lips..- Prickly Pear Oil: Moisture barrier feels boosted with added hydration..- Vegan Collagen: Leaves lips feeling moisturized and supple...Ingredient Callouts: It is gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: A science-forward, skincare-infused formula that combines the hydration of a lip oil, cushion of a balm, volumizing effect of a plumper, and high shine of a gloss. It’s formulated with a custom blend of Maxi-Lip™ and Volulip™ to promote the appearance of fuller lips without any uncomfortable irritation...Research Results: Based on a 3rd party consumer perception study of 35 panelists after two weeks of continuous use:.- Provides burn-free plumping..
ingredients: -Polyplumper Complex: Custom blend of Maxi-Lip™ and Volulip™ for visibly fuller lips..-Prickly Pear Oil: Moisture barrier feels boosted with added hydration..-Vegan Collagen: Leaves lips feeling moisturized and supple...Polybutene, Triisostearoyl Polyglyceryl-3 Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, C18-38 Alkyl Hydroxystearoyl Stearate, Silica, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-37, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Portulaca Pilosa Extract, Squalane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tribehenin, Tocopherol, Sucrose Cocoate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Galactoarabinan, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, Malic Acid, Lactic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Isostearyl Alcohol, Hexylene Glycol, Ethyl Vanillin, Aqua (Water, Eau), Isostearic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, CI 77491/77492/77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6 Lake)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide on lips for buildable color and shine..-Apply liberally three times a day for optimal plumping effect..-Line or fill the lips with Le Monster Lip Crayon (sold separately) for added dimension, amplified color, and serious shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking forward to this one but it was dry right away.
